zh_CN.mate_description_1001: 一种用于装备加工的常见原矿。
zh_CN.mate_description_1002: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由{$1}个铁矿石合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_1003: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由{$1}个玄铁合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_2001: 一种用于装备加工的普通原矿。
zh_CN.mate_description_2002: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由{$1}个铜矿石合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_2003: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由{$1}个赤铜合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_3001: 一种用于装备加工的稀有原矿。
zh_CN.mate_description_3002: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由{$1}个银矿石合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_3003: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由{$1}个白银合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_4001: 一种用于装备加工的珍贵原矿。
zh_CN.mate_description_4002: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由{$1}个金矿石合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_4003: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由{$1}个精金矿合成。
zh_CN.mate_description_9001: 极其稀有的天外异石碎片，闪烁着紫色的光芒，一种用于装备加工或打孔的。
zh_CN.mate_description_9002: 在装备加工或打孔时，即使不幸失败，也不会损坏原有装备。此等神物极难获取，可由{$1}个天外异石碎片合成。

zh_TW.mate_description_1001: 一種用於裝備加工的常見原礦。
zh_TW.mate_description_1002: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由{$1}個鐵礦石合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_1003: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由{$1}個玄鐵合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_2001: 一種用於裝備加工的普通原礦。
zh_TW.mate_description_2002: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由{$1}個銅礦石合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_2003: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由{$1}個赤銅合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_3001: 一種用於裝備加工的稀有原礦。
zh_TW.mate_description_3002: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由{$1}個銀礦石合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_3003: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由{$1}個白銀合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_4001: 一種用於裝備加工的珍貴原礦。

zh_TW.mate_description_4003: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由{$1}個精金礦合成。
zh_TW.mate_description_9001: 極其稀有的天外異石碎片，閃爍著紫色的光芒，一種用於裝備加工或打孔的。
zh_TW.mate_description_9002: 在裝備加工或打孔時，即使不幸失敗，也不會損壞原有裝備。此等神物極難獲取，可由{$1}個天外異石碎片合成。

en_US.card_description: After being inset into equipment, adds +{$1}{$2}
en_US.mate_description_1001: A common raw material used for equipment crafting.
en_US.mate_description_1002: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from {$1} Iron Ores.
en_US.mate_description_1003: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from {$1} Mysterious Irons.
en_US.mate_description_2001: A common raw material used for equipment crafting.
en_US.mate_description_2002: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from {$1} Copper Ores.
en_US.mate_description_2003: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from {$1} Red Coppers.
en_US.mate_description_3001: A rare raw material used for equipment crafting.
en_US.mate_description_3002: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from {$1} Silver Ores.
en_US.mate_description_3003: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from {$1} Silvers.
en_US.mate_description_4001: A precious raw material used for equipment crafting.
en_US.mate_description_4002: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from {$1} Gold Ores.
en_US.mate_description_4003: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from {$1} Refined Gold Ores.
en_US.mate_description_9001: Extremely rare exotic stone fragments that shimmer with a purple light, used for equipment crafting or perforation.
en_US.mate_description_9002: Even in the unfortunate event of failure during equipment crafting or perforation, the original equipment will not be damaged. Such divine artifacts are extremely difficult to obtain and can be synthesized from {$1} exotic stone fragments.

description.zh_TW: 使用後，可修改玩家角色名稱

description.zh_TW: 使用後，可重新選擇玩家角色顏色
description.en_US: Upon use, allows re-selection of player character color.

description.zh_CN: 一种用于装备加工的常见原矿。
description.zh_TW: 一種用於裝備加工的常見原礦。
description.en_US: A common raw material used for equipment crafting.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由5个铁矿石合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由5個鐵礦石合成。
description.en_US: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from 5 Iron Ores.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由3个玄铁合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由3個玄鐵合成。
description.en_US: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from 3 Mysterious Irons.

description.zh_CN: 一种用于装备加工的普通原矿。
description.zh_TW: 一種用於裝備加工的普通原礦。
description.en_US: A common raw material used for equipment crafting.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由5个铜矿石合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由5個銅礦石合成。
description.en_US: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from 5 Copper Ores.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由3个赤铜合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由3個赤銅合成。
description.en_US: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from 3 Red Coppers.

description.zh_CN: 一种用于装备加工的稀有原矿。
description.zh_TW: 一種用於裝備加工的稀有原礦。
description.en_US: A rare raw material used for equipment crafting.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由5个银矿石合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由5個銀礦石合成。
description.en_US: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from 5 Silver Ores.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由3个白银合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由3個白銀合成。
description.en_US: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from 3 Silvers.

description.zh_CN: 一种用于装备加工的珍贵原矿。
description.zh_TW: 一種用於裝備加工的珍貴原礦。
description.en_US: A precious raw material used for equipment crafting.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工的半成品矿，可由5个金矿石合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工的半成品礦，可由5個金礦石合成。
description.en_US: A semi-finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting, can be synthesized from 5 Gold Ores.

description.zh_CN: 常用于装备加工或打孔的成品矿，可由3个精金矿合成。
description.zh_TW: 常用於裝備加工或打孔的成品礦，可由3個精金礦合成。
description.en_US: A finished ore commonly used for equipment crafting or perforation, can be synthesized from 3 Refined Gold Ores.

description.zh_CN: 极其稀有的天外异石碎片，闪烁着紫色的光芒，一种用于装备加工或打孔的。
description.zh_TW: 極其稀有的天外異石碎片，閃爍著紫色的光芒，一種用於裝備加工或打孔的。
description.en_US: Extremely rare exotic stone fragments that shimmer with a purple light, used for equipment crafting or perforation.

description.zh_CN: 在装备加工或打孔时，即使不幸失败，也不会损坏原有装备。此等神物极难获取，可由30个天外异石碎片合成。
description.zh_TW: 在裝備加工或打孔時，即使不幸失敗，也不會損壞原有裝備。此等神物極難獲取，可由30個天外異石碎片合成。
description.en_US: Even in the unfortunate event of failure during equipment crafting or perforation, the original equipment will not be damaged. Such divine artifacts are extremely difficult to obtain and can be synthesized from 30 exotic stone fragments.
